title: Why we conserve energy: the witch of the Great Black Pool

description: Uses an animated allegory about the Land of the Scatterpods whose inhabitants love machines to emphasize the importance of energy conservation and utilization of solar, water and wind energy. Story by Marie Winn Miller. Suitable for primary school level.
